description: Ask your council about before and after school clubs and holiday play schemes run by a school, private or voluntary organisation

details.introduction: Search for before and after school clubs and holiday play schemes in your area. They can be run by a school, or a private or voluntary organisation.

Schools and education

contents.text: Check what help you could get with childcare costs
You can only get help with 'approved childcare'.
Find out what 'approved childcare' is

steps.title: Find out if you can get help with childcare costs

contents.text: Find a nursery school place
Find a registered childminder
Search for free early education and childcare

steps.title: Find where you can get childcare

contents.text: You can get help with childcare costs for children under 18. You might be able to apply for:
Tax-Free Childcare
tax credits
Universal Credit
help while you study
You could also get free hours childcare when your child is aged 2 to 4. You might be able to apply for:
free education and childcare for 2 year olds
15 hours free childcare for 3 to 4 year olds
free childcare if you're working
You can only get childcare vouchers if you have already joined a scheme.
Check the rules for childcare vouchers
Tell government straight away if your circumstances change and you're getting:
tax credits
Universal Credit
If you're getting free childcare if you're working or Tax-Free Childcare you have to confirm if your details are up to date every 3 months.
Sign into your childcare account to find out when you next have to check your details
Your eligibility for support with childcare costs might also change.
Check if your eligibility for help with childcare costs has changed

steps.title: Check what to do if your circumstances change

contents.text: Apply for a primary school place
Find before and after school and holiday clubs
You might be able to use help like tax credits or Tax-Free Childcare to pay for childcare like wraparound care, after school clubs or other activities.

steps.title: Check what to do when your child reaches school age
